name: Phantasy Star Universe: Ambition of the Illuminus
name_original: Phantasy Star Universe: Ambition of the Illuminus
description:
Phantasy Star Universe: Ambition of the Illuminus is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by SEGA. It was originally released in 2007. SEGA published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Phantasy Star Universe: Ambition of the Illuminus on PC.
